It appears that you are not properly setting up the requirements for your 
plugin in the xml?  Does your plugin specify that it 
requires "org.eclipse.debug.ui"?

In the plugin.xml for your plugin do you have:
<requires>
   <import plugin="org.eclipse.debug.ui"/>
</requires>
Yes, problem was in it. Thanks and sorry for troubling you
